price: Tungeli penda tungeli yafanya ya chumvi. Basi mbona hamshukuru?
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: Lau tungeli taka tungeli yafanya hayo maji yakawa ya chumvi yasiyo nyweka. Basi mbona hamumshukuru Mwenyezi Mungu aliye yajaalia matamu yenye kunyweka?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
